english.segment1: You. Hold the world in motion. You say the world and heaven opens. You flung the stars into space. God of wonders. You know my name
english.segment2: When the day is gone. and the house is still. My hungry soul cries out. To find You. And You're waiting for me. Waiting for me
english.segment3: So many things I long to say. But in You presence. I am speechless. For I am loved by You
english.segment4: You. Hold the world in motion. You say the world and heaven opens. You flung the stars into space. God of wonders. You know my name
english.segment5: In a crowded world. Your faithfulness. Reaches to hold me. Ever thankful. That I am loved by You
english.segment6: There's an anthem. Beckoing in me to sing. I'll play it for You, play it for You. There's a song of hope. That I need to bring. I'll sing it for You, I'll sing it for You
english.segment7: Every time I call Your name I know. You're waiting for me, waiting for me. Every day and night. I come and bow. Before Your throne
english.segment8: You. Oceans rise to praise You. You paint the skies with the colours of grace. You. Hold my life in Your hands. God of wonders. You know my name
english.segment9: You. Hold the world in motion. You say the world and heaven opens. You flung the stars into space. God of wonders. You know my name
